item.title: Building High-Performance Security Teams in 2024
item.description:
Building High-Performance Security Teams in 2024

After two decades of building and leading security teams, I’ve learned that great security doesn’t come from tools—it comes from people. The best security programs are built by diverse, motivated teams who understand both the technical challenges and business context of their work.

The Current Talent Landscape

The cybersecurity talent shortage is real, but it’s not just about numbers. We’re facing a skills mismatch where organizations seek senior-level expertise while entry-level professionals struggle to gain experience.
